author: Shubhomoy Sikdar
text:
In police custody for two days, Jawaharlal Nehru University students Umar Khalid and Anirban Bhattacharya have repeatedly expressed fears about their safety once the remand comes to an end, sources said.The two are being interrogated in connection with a sedition case registered against them and several others following a controversial event held on the JNU campus on the third anniversary of the hanging of Afzal Guru on February 9.

Lodged in a lock up in the South Delhi building which houses both South Campus and R.K. Puram police stations since late Tuesday night, the duo has interjected the questioning sessions several times to speak about issues concerning their safety.
title: Kanhaiya, Umar express fears about safety
